001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
005import androidx.preference.PreferenceFragmentCompat;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.R;
007
008/**
009 * this instantiates the settings fragment
010 */
011public class SettingsFragment extends PreferenceFragmentCompat {
012
013  @Override
014  public void onCreatePreferences(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState, @Nullable String rootKey) {
015    setPreferencesFromResource(R.xml.root_preferences, rootKey);
016  }
017}
